briefTitle: Efficacy and Safety of Ergoferon for COVID-19 Prevention During Vaccination Against SARS-CoV-2
officialTitle: Multicenter, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Randomized, Parallel-group Clinical Trial to Evaluate the Efficacy and Safety of Ergoferon as Non-specific COVID-19 Prevention During Vaccination Against SARS-CoV-2
summary:
The multicenter, double-blind, placebo-controlled, parallel-group, randomized clinical trial.

The objective of this study is to evaluate the efficacy and safety of Ergoferon as a non-specific preventive medicine for COVID-19 in individuals vaccinated against a new coronavirus infection (SARS-CoV-2)

primaryOutcome.measure: The Number of Laboratory-confirmed SARS-CoV-2 Infections.
